BNC User Reference Guide

<address>

address contains a postal address, for example of a publisher, an organization, or an individual.
Class model.addressLike model.publicationStmtPart
Declaration 
element address { macro.phraseSeq }
Attributes
(Global attributes only)
Example
 <address
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">natcorp@oucs.ox.ac.uk</address>
Example
 <address
xmlns:xaira="http://www.xaira.org/ns/1.0/spec"
xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
xmlns:rng="http://relaxng.org/ns/structure/1.0">13 Banbury Road, Oxford OX2 6NN,UK</address>
; ;
Module core
